Generation VI.X: This ancient Pokémon was restored from part of its body that had been frozen in ice for over 100 million years.
Generation VI.Y: This calm Pokémon lived in a cold land where there were no violent predators like Tyrantrum.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: This ancient Pokémon was restored from part of its body that had been frozen in ice for over 100 million years.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: This calm Pokémon lived in a cold land where there were no violent predators like Tyrantrum.

Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It lived in cold areas in ancient times. It's said that when Amaura whinnies, auroras appear in the night sky.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Amaura was restored successfully, but it's not expected to live long because of the heat of the current environment.

Generation VIII.Sword: This Pokémon was successfully restored from a fossil. In the past, it lived with others of its kind in cold lands where there were fewer predators.
Generation VIII.Shield: Amaura is an ancient Pokémon that has gone extinct. Specimens of this species can sometimes be found frozen in ice.

Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Trade Receive Sail Fossil held by a traded Pokémon and revive it Event
